name: Darklord Dance
effectText: Fusion Summon 1 DARK Fairy Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing monsters from your hand, field, and/or GY as material. The monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 1000 ATK. If Summoning a "Darklord" Fusion Monster this way, you can also use "Darklord" monsters your opponent controls as material. You can only activate 1 "Darklord Dance" per turn.
